title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 1 Albert Breer
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 1 Albert Breer
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they’re recapping Hideki Matsuyama’s win at The Masters Tournament, but Doug explains why he just couldn’t get into it this year. Plus, Sports Illustrated’s Albert Breer joins the show to talk about some of his experiences with youth sports, Deshaun Watson, and all the latest in the NFL!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
